actions.name: PLUGIN_CREATION_ACTIONS
actions.description: Create a plugin from a JSON specification

content.text: Create a plugin for managing user preferences
I'll create a user preferences management plugin for you.

actions.name: CHECK_PLUGIN_CREATION_STATUS
actions.description: Check the status of a plugin creation job

content.text: What's the status of my plugin creation?
Let me check the status of your plugin creation job...

actions.name: CANCEL_PLUGIN_CREATION
actions.description: Cancel the current plugin creation job

content.text: I'll cancel the current plugin creation job.

actions.name: CREATE_PLUGIN_FROM_DESCRIPTION
actions.description: Create a plugin from a natural language description

content.text: I need a plugin that helps manage todo lists with add, remove, and list functionality
I'll create a todo list management plugin based on your description.
